org.matsim.contrib.socnetgen.sna.snowball.analysis

Class EstimatedTransitivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.contrib.socnetgen.sna.graph.analysis.AbstractVertexProperty
      • org.matsim.contrib.socnetgen.sna.graph.analysis.Transitivity
        • org.matsim.contrib.socnetgen.sna.snowball.analysis.EstimatedTransitivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VertexProperty

    public class EstimatedTransitivity
extends Transitivity
    A class that provides functionality to estimate triangular configurations in a graph.
    Author:
    illenberger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EstimatedTransitivity(PiEstimator piEstimator, DescriptivePiStatisticsFactory factory, boolean estimEdges)
      Creates a new estimated transitivity object with piEstimator as the pi-estimator and factor as the factor for creating new DescriptivePiStatistics object that do the actual estimation of properties.

      Deprecated. 
      protected double estimateAdjacentEdges(SampledVertex vertex, int n_edge) 
      double globalClusteringCoefficient(Graph graph)
      Calculates the global clustering coefficient, which is defined as the three times the number of triangles over the number of connected triples.
      <V extends Vertex>

      Estimates the local clustering coefficient for all sampled vertices.
      org.matsim.contrib.common.stats.DescriptivePiStatistics statistics(Set<? extends Vertex> vertices)
      Returns a descriptive statistics object containing the estimated local clustering coefficients of vertices sampled in or up to the next to last iteration each associated a pi-value.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EstimatedTransitivity

        public EstimatedTransitivity(PiEstimator piEstimator,
                             DescriptivePiStatisticsFactory factory,
                             boolean estimEdges)
        Creates a new estimated transitivity object with piEstimator as the pi-estimator and factor as the factor for creating new DescriptivePiStatistics object that do the actual estimation of properties. If the switch estimEdges is set to true missing edges between neighbours are also estimated.
        Parameters:
        piEstimator - the pi-estimator
        factory - a factory for creating new instance of DescriptivePiStatistics
        estimEdges - true if missing edges between neighbours are to be estimated.

    • Method Detail

      • enableCaching

        @Deprecated
public void enableCaching(boolean flag)
        Deprecated. 
        Enables caching functionality. If localClusteringCoefficients(Collection) is called multiple times with a set of vertices of same size the calculation is done only once.
        Parameters:
        flag - true to enable caching.

      • localClusteringCoefficients

        public <V extends Vertex> gnu.trove.map.hash.TObjectDoubleHashMap<V> localClusteringCoefficients(Collection<V> vertices)
        Estimates the local clustering coefficient for all sampled vertices.
        Overrides:
        localClusteringCoefficients in class Transitivity
        Parameters:
        vertices - a set of sampled vertices
        Returns:
        a object-double map with all sampled vertices and their estimated local clustering coefficients.

        public org.matsim.contrib.common.stats.DescriptivePiStatistics statistics(Set<? extends Vertex> vertices)

      • globalClusteringCoefficient

        public double globalClusteringCoefficient(Graph graph)
        Description copied from class: Transitivity
        Calculates the global clustering coefficient, which is defined as the three times the number of triangles over the number of connected triples.
        Overrides:
        globalClusteringCoefficient in class Transitivity
        Parameters:

        Returns:
